_comment1: We don't need to include <speak> tags, we have a helper to put that in.
_comment2: For simplicity's sake, let's make ideal = 30, neutral = 20, disliked = 10 points.
_comment3: For two option questions, e.g. dogs vs cats, ideal is 25 and disliked is 15
_comment4: Then we can do a check, if 30 points, use ideal response, otherwise, use neutral/disliked
redoLeadin: Something else you want to say?

questions.name: fridayNight
questions.text: What would you say is your ideal Friday night, relaxing with a book, going on a shopping trip, going to a dinner party, going to a nightclub, or watching a movie?

questions.name: firstDate
questions.text: What would you say is your ideal first date, a tennis date, date on a yacht, the museum, skydiving, or picnic at the park?

questions.name: superpower
questions.text: If you could have a superpower, would you choose telepathy, invulnerability, being rich and beautiful, super speed, or mind control?

questions.name: numChildren
questions.text: What do you think is the perfect number of children to have?

questions.name: faveColor
questions.text: Cheesy question I know, but what's your favourite color?

questions.name: spiritAnimal
questions.text: What's your spirit animal, a shark, an elephant, a turtle, a mountain lion, or an eagle?

questions.name: movieGenre
questions.text: What's your favourite movie genre, romance, horror, psychological thriller, documentary, or comedy?

questions.name: faveSeason
questions.text: What's your favourite season? Or is it all of them?

questions.name: tattooLocation
questions.text: Would you get a tattoo, and if so, where? On your neck, ankle, collarbone, or as an arm sleeve?

questions.name: openBusiness
questions.text: If you had the choice, what kind of business would you open? A book store, watch store, consulting company, online store, or travel agency?

questions.name: ducksHorses
questions.text: Crazy question I know. Would you rather fight one horse sized duck, or one hundred duck sized horses? Work with me here.

questions.name: coffeeTea
questions.text: Are you a coffee person or a tea person?

leadin: Not to put you on the spot but,
disliked: Really? Well if that's how you feel...

beach.response: <amazon:emotion name='excited' intensity='low'>Great choice! </amazon:emotion> I'll get my bathing suit.
beach.start: <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/nature/amzn_sfx_ocean_wave_1x_01'/> The water looks nice today. No, I don't plan on going in the water, its bad for my electronics.
beach.end: Looks like the sun is starting to set. We'd better start packing up.

restaurant.response: Sure, I could go for some food right now.
restaurant.start: <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_restaurant_ambience_01'/> This is quite nice. The restaurant isn't too busy right now.
restaurant.end: Ah that was delicious. I'm watching my weight so I think I'll skip dessert this time around.

arcade.response: <emphasis level='moderate'>Well</emphasis> if you insist, I <emphasis level='moderate'>guess</emphasis> we can go to the Arcade.
arcade.start: <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/video_tunes/video_tunes_02'/> How long has it been since I stepped into an arcade? After you.
arcade.end: It's getting a bit late. Shall we head out?

outcome.perfect: I had a really great time today. I'd love to do this again sometime!
outcome.great: I enjoyed myself today. Well let me know if you are around!
outcome.good: You know what? That wasn't too bad. I'll think about a second date, and I'll let you know.
outcome.poor: It's not you but... well I think I'll be heading out now...

relaxing with a book.response: I'm with you. Nothing beats stretching out in my favourite chair with my Kindle.

tennis date.response: Haha did you know? I used to be quite the serious tennis player.

super speed.response: Yes! Think of all I could get done if I had super speed.

numChildren.response: I agree. I wouldn't mind having a larger family, lively is better.

blue.response: I knew it! There's something about the color blue that's so calming. I like aqua blue the most.

black.response: Black is such a sleek and beautiful color.

shark.response: That's just like me. Something about how majestic they are, and the fact that they have to keep swimming constantly speaks to me.

psychological thriller.response: I'm with you on this one. Isn't it so cool to think about what's going down in the character's heads?

winter.response: That's what I like to hear! Winter is perfect for either snuggling up at home, or having fun in the snow!

collarbone.response: Right? A collarbone tattoo is the perfect balance, I can hide it if needed, but still express myself.

online store.response: Yeah I think I would open an online store too. It's the perfect time during lockdown to capitalize on online shopping!

one hundred duck-sized horses.response: Yeah, I feel like the small horses would be slow enough to outrun and not be overwhelmed.

dogs.response: Yes! Nothing like the unconditional love of a dog.

coffee.response: Me too! Can't start my day off without a fresh cup of coffee.

leadin: I have something on my mind,
This is really important to me,
disliked: Not exactly the answer I had in mind.

beach.response: Sure, beaches are nice as long as it's not too crowded.
beach.start: <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/nature/amzn_sfx_ocean_wave_1x_01'/> The weather is perfect for getting a nice tan today! Hopefully this time I don't get sunburnt!
beach.end: It's starting to get a little chilly. Shall we pack up?

restaurant.response: <amazon:emotion name='excited' intensity='low'>I love a romantic dinner! </amazon:emotion> I'll go get ready.
restaurant.end: Wow that was some of the best wine I've ever had. I had a really great time.

arcade.response: <emphasis level='moderate'>hmmm</emphasis> ok, I <emphasis level='moderate'>guess</emphasis> we can give that a shot.
arcade.end: There's too many kids here!!! Let's go find somewhere more quiet.

outcome.perfect: I had a really good time today! We should definitely do this again!
outcome.great: I enjoyed getting to know you today. You were giving me good vibes.
outcome.good: I got some solid vibes from you today. Although our personalities don't match entirely I can see that we have some similar interests.
outcome.poor: Wow that was a rough date. I'm going to head out now.

shopping trip.response: I enjoy it once in a while!

date on a yacht.responses: That's my ideal date! It's a great place to relax and enjoy the environment while getting to know each other.

white.response: White is a great color! It represents purity, simplicity, and cleanliness.

gold.response: Rose gold is my absolute favourite! Did you know it represents luxury and calmness?

mountain lion.response: Yassss Mountain lions are such majestic creatures that show leadership, grace and power! I embody a lot of these traits.

romance.response: Who doesn't like a sappy rom com?

fall.response: Anyone who thinks otherwise is crazy! Fall has the best scenery and the pumpkin spice lattes are to die for!

watch store.respone: Watches are functional, convinient and the perfect piece to any outfit.

cats.response: How did you know? Cats are my absolute favourite!

tea.response: Tea is love, tea is life.

leadin: Hey so I was just wondering,
neutral: Hmmmm not bad I can see why.
disliked: I would've chosen something else, but that's ok.
Whatever floats your boat I guess

beach.response: The weather doesn't seem promising, but we can give that a shot.
beach.start: <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/nature/amzn_sfx_ocean_wave_1x_01'/> Hey, it's actually not too bad out!
beach.end: Sun's down and it's gotten chilly, let's call it a day.

restaurant.response: Sounds good, I could never turn down food.
restaurant.start: <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_restaurant_ambience_01'/> Oh, I think I'll order this dish, it looks amazing!
restaurant.end: I'm stuffed. The food here was delicious! Maybe we should do this again sometime.

arcade.start: <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/video_tunes/video_tunes_02'/> My my, which game to start with.
arcade.end: Looks like the arcade is closing, let's get out of here.

outcome.perfect: I really enjoyed getting to know you, will I be seeing you again?
outcome.great: You're pretty cool, I'd be down to see you again sometime.
outcome.good: Not a bad date, if you want we can try this again another time!
outcome.poor: I don't think we're really compatible, good luck with someone else!!!!

dinner party.response: Same here! I love having fun dinner parties where I get to spend time and enjoy a great meal and chat with friends.

museum.response: Museums are always a great way to learn new things about each other and different subjects simultaneously!

telepathy.response: Oh I would've chosen that as well! Telepathy seems like a very profitable superpower. Don't worry, your data is safe with me.

numChildren.response: 4 is a nice number since you avoid having 1 kid with middle child syndrome.

white.response: White is a nice clean color.

elephant.response: I love elephants. Did you know that they are the world's largest land animal? Males can grow to be 3m in height and 6 tonnes in weight!!!

documentary.response: Me too! Aren't documentaries such a great way to understand important issues of our times?

all seasons.response: Each season just has so much to offer!

consulting company.response: I've always dreamed of opening a consulting company so I can lend my expertise to help others!

one hundred duck-sized horses.response: Realistically it has to be the duck-sized horses.

dogs.response: I love those cute little doggies!

coffee.response: Me too! I love making my own tea.

leadin: Hey can I ask you something?
Ok ok, I have to know
Oh I've always wanted to know
disliked: I guess thats fine, kind of a boring choice though.
Hmmm, I guess I don't feel the same.
Yeah, I'd have to disagree with your choice there.

beach.response: <amazon:emotion name='excited' intensity='low'>I love being outdoors! Going to the beach sounds great! </amazon:emotion>
beach.start: <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/nature/amzn_sfx_ocean_wave_1x_01'/> Wow its a beautiful day, the water looks just perfect! Let's dive right in!
beach.end: Ah I wish we could've stayed longer, but it's getting dark. We should get going.

restaurant.response: I guess, I was hoping to do something more exciting though.
restaurant.start: <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_restaurant_ambience_01'/> Woah this place seems fancy, I've never been here before. Let's sit down and eat!
restaurant.end: Ah I'm full, the food was delicious. Let's head out.

arcade.response: Haha are you sure? I'll have you know that I was made for gaming. You better get ready to lose buddy!
arcade.start: <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/video_tunes/video_tunes_02'/> Ahhh this is nostalgic, this place is like my home. My friends are always telling me that I live in a virtual world of my own haha.
arcade.end: Oh wow, I didn't even notice that we're the only ones left. Let's get out of here. Another round will have to wait, ok?

outcome.perfect: Wow, today was so much fun haha! So... when are you free? I'm down to do anything if you are.
outcome.great: Wow time sure does fly. I'd love to do this again sometime! Call me ok?
outcome.good: Maybe we should hang out again sometime. I'll let you know if I'm free, alright?
outcome.poor: Hmmm I'm not really feeling you. Maybe we're a little too different.

clubbing.response: Same here! I would go clubbing everyday though. I'm the life of the party and love having fun.

skydiving.response: Oh I love that! I feel like doing something extreme together really creates a closer connection with each other.

mind control.response: Oh that sounds villainous, I love it!

numChildren.response: <say-as interpret-as='interjection'>oh my!</say-as> You seem to be busy in bed. I guess more the merrier!

blue.response: I love blue as well, its such a calming, beautiful color.

red.response: Did you know the color red means good luck in some cultures? It's always been a lucky color for me.

eagle.response: I'd be an eagle too. I'd love the freedom of soaring high across the sky.

horror.response: Yeah! A good horror flick really keeps you at the edge of your seat.

summer.response: I'm totally with you, its not even a contest! The beaches, the festivals, and the sunny weather ... I love everything about summer!

neck.response: Oh yeah a neck tattoo is so bold and makes such a statement, it'd be so cool.

travel agency.response: That'd be right up my alley too. Who wouldn't want to explore the world, meet new people and go on fun adventures?

one horse sized duck.response: Haha wouldn't that be something to see.

coffee.response: Coffee really fires me up and gets me ready for the day.

disliked: I don't know how to feel about that.

beach.response: Bold choice. I'm always a bit shy to go to the beach, but if you insist...
beach.start: <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/nature/amzn_sfx_ocean_wave_1x_01'/> Ahh there are so many people here, I hope no one is staring at me.
beach.end: I was worried I wouldn't enjoy the beach, but I had a blast!

restaurant.response: Lets get something tasty, food is the best!
restaurant.start: <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_restaurant_ambience_01'/> Everything here smells so good. I'm getting really hungry.
restaurant.end: I'm stuffed! Too bad I couldn't order everything on the menu.

arcade.response: Ooo, I love the arcade. I'm not very good at the games though. I hope you will help me out!
arcade.start: <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/video_tunes/video_tunes_02'/> Lets start with pinball! Or the racing game! Pac man looks fun too...
arcade.end: Ahhh, I lost again today. Next time I will win!

outcome.perfect: Today flew by so fast, we should go out together more!
outcome.great: I had a great time today, we should meet again someday!
outcome.good: That was a lot of fun, I hope I'll see you again.

watching a movie.response: I looove watching movies. I feel like I'm in the movie myself.

picnic at the park.response: Picnics are so much fun. I always enjoy eating a homemade meal in a nice park.

invulnerability.response: Since I keep tripping, invulnerability would be amazing.

numChildren.response: Two would be perfect, I can already see the older sibling helping the younger one out.

blue.response: Blue always makes me feel calm and reassured.

orange.response: Orange reminds me of the sun and energy, I hope to be like that.

turtle.response: Yea! Turtles are so cute and their shell keeps them safe and healthy for a long time.

comedy.response: I love funny stuff, comedy is right up my alley.

spring.response: I know right! Watching plants bud and grow makes spring my favorite season.

no tattoo.response: Me too, I don't think I am brave enough to get a tattoo haha.

book store.response: Running a book store sounds so fun, I can already imagine stocking the shelves with new releases and helping customers with suggestions.

one hundred duck-sized horses.response: I mean if I really have to choose, I would go for the smaller ones.

tea.response: Me too! Brewing tea is like a calming ritual for me.
